DescriptionType.name: General
DescriptionType.description: Unstructured, long description of the activity

DescriptionType.name: Objectives
DescriptionType.description: Specific objectives for the activity, e.g. taken from logical framework

DescriptionType.name: Target Groups
DescriptionType.description: Details of groups that are intended to benefit from the activity

DescriptionType.name: Other
DescriptionType.description: For miscellaneous use. A further classification or breakdown may be included in the narrative
